question:
Your local hospital has advertised for people to do unpaid work helping at the hospitsal. You would like to do some work at the hospital in your free time. 
Write a letter to the hospital. In your letter
-explain why you would like to do unpaid work at the hospital
-say what type of unpaid work you would be able to do
-give details of when you would be available for this work
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest to do unpaid work at YVR hospital as I wanted to do some social activities. Hence, please consider my application to perform my job as you guys are helping to town during this critical time and I am very happy to be part of your time.

I Did my graduation in health and sciences and I can take care of outpatients as I worked a couple of years in past as well. In addition, I can extend my support during nighttime if any of the doctors are on vacation. Despite  my daily work, I am ready to take  charge of duty doctor and I am sure that I can    provide the best service to our community people.

Right now I am busy with my regular job and I may not be available until the end of this month. Please feel  free to call me if there is an emergency and I will accommodate my current job schedule and join with you to mitigate the situation. I can take charge right from the first week onwards and I would happy to answer if there are any questions on work and past experience.
I look forward to hearing your response to my social work request.
